scripts.build:functions: npm run build:database  && npm i --workspace=packages/functions && npm run build --workspace=packages/functions
scripts.build:lib: npm run build:interfaces && npm i --workspace=packages/lib && npm run build --workspace=packages/lib
scripts.build:database: npm run build:interfaces && npm i --workspace=packages/database && npm run build --workspace=packages/database
scripts.build:api: npm run build:database && npm i --workspace=packages/api && npm run build --workspace=packages/api
scripts.clean:functions: rm -rf packages/functions/interfaces; rm -rf packages/functions/database; rm -rf packages/functions/lib; rm -rf packages/functions/node_modules
scripts.clean:interfaces: rm -rf packages/interfaces/interfaces; rm -rf packages/interfaces/lib; rm -rf packages/interfaces/node_modules
scripts.clean:lib: rm -rf packages/lib/interfaces; rm -rf packages/lib/lib; rm -rf packages/lib/node_modules
scripts.clean:indexes: rm -rf packages/indexes/interfaces; rm -rf packages/indexes/lib; rm -rf packages/indexes/node_modules
scripts.clean: npm run clean:functions; npm run clean:interfaces; npm run clean:indexes; npm run clean:lib; npm run clean:api; npm run clean:database; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.prettier: npm run prettier:functions; npm run prettier:interfaces; npm run prettier:indexes; npm run prettier:lib; npm run prettier:database; npm run prettier:api
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean; npm run build
